text: @marcorubio @GovRonDeSantis Really?  The constant sugar-coating and outright lying about Covid-19 pandemic from the start by trump, his administration, GOP governors and GOP senators has damaged this country. Trying to spin this story doesn’t stop the sickness and death of Americans.
